title: League client stuck at 87%
body:
I got a new laptop so downloaded league again with the new client so it had to 'download the play button' as well (there was a percentage over where play is usually). It was working fine until 87% where it just stopped and it hasn't increased for at least a few hours now.

I've seen other discussions but none of them are recent and refer to updating patches rather than downloading the new client so I would really appreciate any help!

P.S Happy New Year :D

replies.body: get off your high horse Porocles, "strong connection" i got optic fiber it was constant until that damn 87% then , DUH hit the problem of your freaking client, CAN YOU JUST TELL UR CLIENT STILL GARBAGE, nope need to say need bullshit everytime
having the same problem and riot your "connection issues" steps does not help fix the problem

At this point in the patcher, your network needs to keep a strong connection to download updates but is failing.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection to the patching servers for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
